name: Jewel Castle - jewels puzzle game
description:
Jewel Castle - phenomenal free classic match 3 puzzle !!
Swipe & crush to unlock your next adventure, match and collect colorful Diamond 💎
This is Mind Blowing jewel puzzle to ease your mind and activate brain 😌

Features:
💖 Unlimited energy for unlimited play
🎮 Over 1000 + addictive levels and stages.
💯 Completely free to play
📶 Internet connection not required
😂 Juicy graphics and fantastic effect!
👫 Easy and fun game for kids and elders to enjoy
⏳ Relaxing jewel match 3 with enjoyable challenges
👨‍🏫 Puzzle helps to train your brain for critical thinking
💁🏻 Supporting 16 languages in all tablet devices!

How to play:
☃️Each level has its own mission for you to unlock the next level
☃️Connect 3 identical jewels to crush jewels
☃️Connect 4 jewels to create special jewels blast
☃️Connect 5 jewels for ultimate jewel castle crush effect
☃️Try out your own strategies to make simultaneous crushes
☃️Use free boost items in challenging mode
☃️Achieve high score and record your nickname in the ranking system

This game supports : '한국어', 'Indonesian', 'Bahasa malay', 'English', '日本語', '中文简体', '中文繁體', 'Deutsch', 'français', 'Español', 'ไทย', 'Русский', 'Arabic', 'Portuguese', 'Turkish', 'Italian'

This game is acceptable for purchasing the items partially. When purchasing the items, the additional costs could be occurred and limited Consumer Right of Defense according to the item types.
